entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow over southern sections. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
